statements: SELECT * FROM Leads WHERE age > 30;
SELECT lead_name, age FROM Leads WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT lead_name, location FROM Leads WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Leads WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY lead_id;
SELECT lead_name AS Name, gender AS Gender FROM Leads WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM Leads WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT lead_id, lead_name FROM Leads WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT lead_name, location FROM Leads WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY location DESC, lead_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Leads WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND location LIKE 'Los%' ORDER BY age DESC, location ASC, lead_name DESC;
SELECT lead_id, gender FROM Leads WHERE lead_name LIKE '%Smith%' OR location LIKE '%San%' ORDER BY gender ASC, lead_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM leads WHERE age > 30;
SELECT lead_id, first_name, email FROM leads WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM segments WHERE region = 'Europe' AND segment_name = 'VIP';
SELECT segment_name, age_range FROM segments WHERE segment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT lead_id, first_name, last_name FROM leads;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE age > 30;
SELECT lead_id, email, gender FROM leads WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT segment_name, region FROM segments WHERE age_range @> '[{"min": 20, "max": 30}]';
SELECT lead_id, first_name, last_name, email, age, gender FROM leads JOIN segments ON leads.age = segments.age_range->>'max';
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM leads WHERE age > 25;
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM leads GROUP BY gender;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM leads ORDER BY age DESC, last_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM leads WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT lead_id, first_name, last_name, location FROM leads INNER JOIN demographics ON leads.lead_id = demographics.lead_id WHERE demographics.location LIKE '%California%'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM campaigns GROUP BY campaign_name, start_date, end_date
SELECT lead_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, location, income FROM leads INNER JOIN demographics ON leads.lead_id = demographics.lead_id WHERE demographics.income > 50000
SELECT * FROM demograhic_data;
SELECT lead_id, age, gender FROM demograhic_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT lead_id, segment_id, assigned_date FROM lead_assignment WHERE segment_id = 2 AND assigned_date >= NOW();
SELECT * FROM demograhic_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY lead_id DESC;
SELECT lead_id, gender, location FROM demograhic_data WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY lead_id ASC, gender DESC;
SELECT lead_id, segment_name, assigned_date FROM lead_assignment INNER JOIN lead_segments ON lead_assignment.segment_id = lead_segments.segment_id ORDER BY assigned_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;

SELECT lead_id, campaign_name, end_date FROM lead_assignment INNER JOIN marketing_campaigns ON lead_assignment.assignment_id = marketing_campaigns.campaign_id ORDER BY end_date ASC, campaign_name DESC;
SELECT lead_id, first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM lead_segments;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM campaign_history ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT lead_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM lead_interactions WHERE lead_id = 12345;
SELECT lead_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM lead_scores GROUP BY lead_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM lead_segments WHERE age > 30;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_leads FROM campaign_history ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT income, occupation, education_level FROM demographic_data WHERE income > 50000 AND education_level = 'Bachelor';
SELECT lead_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM lead_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT lead_id, score, score_date FROM lead_scores WHERE score > 0.8;
